lines.text:
[Answering the phone]
Hello who is this?
This is experiment number 4, heard your team got it's ass kicked today.

[after getting fed up with Mark blaring an English version of the Nazi Grand March]
Mark turn off that noise.
Noise? I don't hear any noise, it's the Grand March Helen, come on join the parade, come on get in step, feel it.

[after catching Susan spying on him]
Once upon a time there was a little girl who didn't stay in bed when she was told to, she got herself in trouble when spying on her brother and she had to learn to mind the hard way
[grabs Susan's doll and tears it's arm off]
